inclusion.criterion: at least 3 sites were matched within 6 HLA sites
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: donor: not the same blood type and 1 or 2 sites were matched within 6 HLA sites
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen, accompanied by nausea and vomiting. He is a candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
